thread.title: New season, new faces as Ahly prepare for Super Cup showdown with Zamalek
thread.title_full: New season, new faces as Ahly prepare for Super Cup showdown with Zamalek - Egyptian Football - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: New season, new faces as Ahly prepare for Super Cup showdown with Zamalek
text:
Related Ahly fans protest appointment of Peseiro as head coach Ahly’s new defenders Hegazy, Rabia eligible to play against Zamalek in Egypt Super Cup Egypt Super Cup is a difficult mission: Ahly's caretaker coach Zizo Caretaker coach Abdel-Aziz “Zizo” Abdel-Shafy has named several of Ahly’s new signings in his squad for Thursday’s Egypt Super Cup match against Zamalek.
The Super Cup marks the beginning of the 2015/16 season. The Red Devils are keen to make amends after seeing rivals Zamalek win the league and cup in 2014/15. Both clubs exited the CAF Confederation Cup at the semifinal stage.
Ahly’s 27-man squad features newly signed defensive duo Ahmed Hegazy and Rami Rabia, and fellow arrival forward Ahmed El-Sheikh.
Hegazy and Rabia are eligible for the first time while El-Sheikh, who was been registered for some time, has been included in a Ahly’s squad for the second time.
Skipper Hossam Ghaly and attacking midfielder Walid Soliman are also available after recovering from injuries.
Zizo also included players involved in Egypt's friendly game against Zambia on Sunday. They will join up with the squad on Monday when Ahly fly to the United Arab Emirates, where the match will take place.
Ahly squad
Goalkeepers : Sherif Ekrami, Ahmed Adel Abdel-Moneim, Mosaad Awad
Defenders : Mohamed Naguib, Saad Samir, Sherif Hazem, Rami Rabia, Ahmed Hegazy, Bassem Ali, Ahmed Fathi, Sabri Rahil, Hussein El-Sayed, Mohamed Hani
Midfielders : Hossam Ashour, Hossam Ghaly, Saleh Gomaa, Abdallah El-Said, Moemen Zakaria, Walid Soliman, Ahmed El- Sheikh, Ramadan Sobhi
Strikers : John Antwi,Malick Evouna,Amr Gamal,Ahmed Abdel-Zaher,Mohamed Hamdy, Emad Meteb
